intro: Yinshania yunnanensis, commonly known as the Yunnan yinshania, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, fragrant flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. It is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and rocky slopes. Its leaves are usually opposite and have a leathery texture, contributing to its adaptability in diverse habitats.
